Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
Set.Sql: SELECT * FROM _EWA_DOC WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY DOC_LVL , DOC_ORD

Set.Name: OnTreeNodeNew SQL
Set.Sql:
INSERT INTO _EWA_DOC(DOC_PUNID, DOC_UNID, DOC_NAME, DOC_LVL, DOC_ORD) SELECT @DOC_PUNID, @SYS_UNID, @DOC_NAME, A.LVL, B.ORD FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(DOC_LVL) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX(DOC_LVL) + 1 END LVL FROM _EWA_DOC WHERE DOC_UNID=@DOC_PUNID) A, (SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(DOC_ORD) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX(DOC_ORD) + 1 END ORD FROM _EWA_DOC WHERE DOC_PUNID=@DOC_PUNID) B;
SELECT * FROM _EWA_DOC WHERE DOC_UNID=@SYS_UNID

Set.Name: OnPagePost SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE _EWA_DOC SET DOC_NAME = @DOC_NAME, DOC_ORD = @DOC_ORD, DOC_TAG = @DOC_TAG, DOC_TYPE = @DOC_TYPE, DOC_PARA0 = @DOC_PARA0, DOC_PARA1 = @DOC_PARA1, DOC_PARA2 = @DOC_PARA2 WHERE DOC_UNID = @DOC_UNID
